title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Automated Scenario-Based Language Education Website Development Process

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can describe the structure of educational scenarios according to the IMS Learning Design standard.
Learners can automatically generate the structure of a language education website using web-based tools.
Learners can understand XML-based rule systems and edit simple educational content.
Learners can submit website improvement plans incorporating peer feedback through formative assessment.
Learners can design language learning scenarios optimized for mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
